movies.title: Saving General Yang
movies.plot: Northeast China, early Northern Song dynasty, AD 986. The Khitan army takes its revenge for a past massacre, abducting General Yang Ye (Adam Cheng) and leaving his wife and seven sons to rescue him - and fall into their deadly trap. Led by the first son (Ekin Cheng), the seven - two of whom have never seen combat - set out with a small band of fighters to face an army of thousands, brave the treacherous Wolf Mountain, face the nemesis of their shared history, and find the way back alive - all to bring their father home.
movies.simplePlot: Northeast China, early Northern Song dynasty, AD 986. The Khitan army takes its revenge for a past massacre, abducting General Yang Ye (Adam Cheng) and leaving his wife and seven sons to ...

biography.bio: Fan Xu was born on January 15, 1967 in Wuhan, Hubei, China. She is an actress, known for Tremblement de terre à Tangshan (2010), Saving General Yang (2013) and Back to 1942 (2012).
biography.name: Fan Xu

biography.bio: Adam Cheng was born on February 24, 1947 in Hong Kong as Cheng Choung-She. He is known for his work on Zu: Warriors from the Magic Mountain (1983), The Legend (1993) and Saving General Yang (2013). He has been married to Kuan Ching-Hua since 1989. They have two children. He was previously married to Lydia Shum.
biography.name: Adam Cheng

biography.bio: Ekin Cheng Yee-Kin is a Hong Kong actor and Cantopop singer. Earlier in his career he was known as Noodle Cheng, though he has now reverted to a more conventional-sounding first name. Sometimes he uses Dior (because that was what it sounded like when his younger sister tried to call him) as a first name but usually Ekin is the name used. Ekin began acting in commercials when he was in high school, the most well-known being for Hi-C Lemon Tea. After high school, he enrolled in TVB's Martial Arts school, but did not like it and switched to their acting school. After that he began to get a number of TV roles. The latest TVB series he participated in was Always Ready, working with Charmaine Sheh, Bowie Lam, and Linda Chung. Ekin was caught up in a grand scandal after leaving Maggie Siu, an actress whom he dated for many years, for a decade younger actress and singer Gigi Leung. Maggie was well-loved by Hong Kong audiences and gave up her career to support Ekin's career and many slighted him after the breakup. In 2006, Ekin and Gigi broke up, ending their seven-year relationship. In September 2006, Ekin and 'Yoyo Mung' begun dating through their mutual interest in badminton. His first film was Girls Without Tomorrow (1992) and at the time he was still going by the name Dior Cheng. He changed his name to Ekin before his breakout role in the Young and Dangerous series as Chan Ho Nam. The film led to 6 sequels, all starring Ekin Cheng, and a lucrative working partnership with director Andrew Lau. Together they went on to make The Storm Riders, which was the highest-grossing Hong Kong movie at the time and the first film to utilize a truly large number of special effects. They also worked together on The Legend of Speed, A Man Called Hero, The Duel and the comedy Women From Mars. Ekin has branched out in the roles he's taken, including more comedy like earlier in his career with My Wife is 18 and Six Strong Guys, while still doing more action-oriented films like The Twins Effect and Tokyo Raiders. Recently Ekin returned to the movie scene (having taking a break in 2005 to work on the Ultraman TV Series in Thailand), He had a brief appearance in My Name is Fame as himself. Soon after that he starred in Heavenly Mission a triad/cop thriller starring alongside Stephen Fung & Alex Fong. He has completed a Pang Brothers film called The Forest of Death, which will be released in March 2007. He is currently filming a serial in Mainland China based on the life of martial arts master, Huo Yuanjia with former Young & Dangerous co-star Jordan Chan.
biography.name: Ekin Cheng

biography.bio: Bo Yu is an actor, known for Saving General Yang (2013), Fei Tian (2011) and Singing All Along (2016).
biography.name: Bo Yu

biography.bio: Vic Chou was born on June 9, 1981 in Yilan, Taiwan as Yu-Min Chou. He is an actor, known for Home (2012), Love You 10,000 Years (2010) and Meteor Garden (2001). He has been married to Reen Yu since November 10, 2015. They have one child.
biography.name: Vic Chou

biography.bio: Chen Li is an actor and writer, known for Tremblement de terre à Tangshan (2010), Assembly (2007) and Yang Shan Zhou (2011).
biography.name: Chen Li

biography.bio: Raymond Lam was born on December 8, 1979 in Hong Kong as Raymond Lam Fung. He is an actor, known for The Sorcerer and the White Snake (2011), Saving General Yang (2013) and Perfect Wedding (2010).
biography.name: Raymond Lam

biography.bio: Chun Wu was born on October 10, 1979 in Brunei as Kiat-Chun Goh. He is an actor, known for La 14ème Lame (2010), Magic to Win (2011) and Hua yang shao nian shao nu (2006).
biography.name: Chun Wu

biography.bio: Xinbo Fu is an actor, known for Saving General Yang (2013), Hot Summer Days (2010) and The Equation of Love and Death (2008).
biography.name: Xinbo Fu

biography.bio: Bing Shao was born on February 15, 1968 in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China. He is known for his work on The Myth (2005), Red River Valley (1997) and The Lost Bladesman (2011).
biography.name: Bing Shao

biography.bio: Ady An was born on September 29, 1980 in Taipei, Taiwan as Wen-Ching Wu. She is an actress, known for Autumn's Concerto (2009), If You Are the One 2 (2010) and Dou Yu (2004).
biography.name: Ady An

biography.bio: Vivi Lee is an actress, known for Saving General Yang (2013), Can't Buy Me Love (2010) and 72 ga cho hak (2010).
biography.name: Vivi Lee

biography.bio: Apple Wang is an actress, known for Saving General Yang (2013).
biography.name: Apple Wang

biography.bio: Dong Zhang is a producer and actress, known for Mountains May Depart (2015), A Touch of Sin (2013) and Life After Life (2016).
biography.name: Dong Zhang

biography.bio: Cici Chen is known for her work on Blood: The Last Vampire (2009), Saving General Yang (2013) and Gong fu yu jia (2017).
biography.name: Cici Chen

camera: Red Epic, Zeiss Ultra Prime and Angenieux Optimo Lenses
